text: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea is a 1961 American science fiction movie. It was directed by Irwin Allen. Actors include Walter Pidgeon, Robert Sterling, Peter Lorre, Joan Fontaine, Barbara Eden, Michael Ansara, and Frankie Avalon. In 1964, a TV series was made based on the movie. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1961 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Movies set underwater Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Irwin Allen
title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
